modName: A Fashionable Start- Bat Files That Give a Boost
summary: Choose whether you want to start at level 30, 50, or 100 for Thief/Warrior/Mage skills.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][size=6][b]DISCLAIMER: THESE ONLY EDIT YOUR SKILLS, AND ARE CURRENTLY IN WARRIOR[/b],[/size][/color][size=6][color=#ffff00] [/color][b][color=#ffff00]THIEF, AND MAGE CATEGORIES. THEY'RE .BAT FILES [u]NOT[/u] MODS.[/color]

[/b][/size][/center][size=3]Now that that's out of the way, lets get to business. The files basically list off the player.setav command for the Warrior/Thief/Mage skills. Since there is some skill considered to be "in-between skills", Archery is warrior, Alchemy is thief, and  enchanting is mage. Most of you probably don't know what i'm talking about, for those who do, you know what I mean. Feel free to change it, it's not that difficult. I'm open for suggestions for other classes, just give me the skills included, and i'll make a txt file for it. Ask me questions if you don't understand something, I will check somewhat frequently. Please keep in mind that i'm not a modder, so comments that ask something that will change or add things to the game, will be ignored.[/size]

[u][size=5]Install[/size][/u]
[list=1]
[*][size=3]Extract ZIP file using WINRAR or 7 Zip[/size]
[*][size=3]Choose whether you want to "improve" your Mage, Warrior, or Thief skills.[/size]
[*][size=3]Place in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim OR C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=3]Run Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=3]Open command console (~ key)[/size]
[*][size=3]Type: bat (The file you chose, should be something like ThiefClassA or ThiefClassB or ThiefClassC)[/size]
[/list]
author: emoswadrill
